name: BBALL (Ivan Ng)
description:
BBALL is a unique style platformer with cute characters, simple control but dark atmosphere and challenging stages.

Enjoy the fun of bouncing and explore different worlds!

Too hard? Threre's a arrow button under the Pause Menu that reveals where the stars are!

Soundtrack Bandcamp Soundcloud Author

Game Design, Programming, Visual Arts & Music by Ivan Ng

Homepage: http://game.gnnavi.com/bball
